info.name: info
info.error: There was an error while fetching server information.

embed.title: Help Command
embed.description: Hello and welcome to the help command!

fields.name: /broadcast  (word)
fields.value: broadcast message to the server - only works with one word right now

fields.name: /onlineplayers
fields.value: view list of players currently online

fields.name: /save
fields.value: save the server world in its current state

fields.name: /shutdown (seconds) (messageText)
fields.value: shutdown the server with countdown and broadcast in chat

fields.name: /exit
fields.value: shutdown the server with no warning

onlinePlayers.name: onlineplayers
onlinePlayers.error: There was an error while fetching player information

save.name: save
save.description: Saves server world in current state
save.error: There was an error while saving

broadcast.name: broadcast
broadcast.error: There was an error broadcasting this message!

shutdown.name: shutdown
shutdown.description: Shuts the server down with a countdown, broadcasting with a message
shutdown.error: There was an error shutting down!

exit.name: exit
exit.error: There was an error sending exit request
